content: emmy baby cardigan by agnes chow materials baby yarns bernat softee baby antique white was used in this project size g hook yarn needle a button size 12 months old gauge 18 sts and 8 row=4 note all dcs are worked on back loop only only 3dc-in-next st and 5dc-in-next-st are worked on both loops © cutie stuffs llc and monkey booboo crochet this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only please do not reproduce or publish this pattern thank you starting at the neck row 1 chain 72 sts 1 double_crochet in 4th st from hook *3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts repeat from* across ending with 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in last 2 sts row 2 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next st 5 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts *skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 5 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts repeat from* 12 times chain 3 turn row 3 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts *skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from* 12 times chain 3 turn row 4 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 5 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts *skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts 5 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from* 12 times chain 3 turn row 5 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts *skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts repeat from* 12 times chain 3 turn row 6 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts 5 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts *skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts 5 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts repeat from* 12 times chain 3 turn row 7 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 5 sts *skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 5 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 5 sts repeat from* 12 times chain 3 turn row 8 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 4 sts 5 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 5 sts *skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 5 sts 5 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 5 sts repeat from* 12 times chain 3 turn row 9 skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 5 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 6 sts *skip 2 sts 1 double_crochet in next 6 sts 3 double_crochet in
